Summary: Watched large shiny object hover over Reno.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Sparks
There was one other sighting in Sparks on or around November 15th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailson sat. nov. 15th at 3p.m. my girl friend and i were going out the back door of our house on our way to the store, when she noticed a shiny maybe weather balloon looking object in the southern sky 30,000 ft. up ,hard to tell. we watched it for 6or7 mins. with binoculars and it had more of a egg look to it . we left for the store and returned 45 mins. later it was still in the sky! but had moved closer toward reno. the sun was setting and the slow moving object became more shiny and star like it moved to a moer westerly position when it seem to eject 5 star like objects ther seemed to be some gas or smoke emitted as the objects lined up one higher and 4 lowerer from the original object they all seemed to fly west till i could no longer see them.
